remarks: A syllogism rule of inference.  The second premise is used to replace the consequent of the first premise.  Copy of ~ syl6 with a different proof.  (Contributed by Wolf Lammen, 17-Dec-2018.) (New usage is discouraged.)  (Proof modification is discouraged.)
statement:
wl-syl6.1 $e |- ( ph -> ( ps -> ch ) ) $.
wl-syl6.2 $e |- ( ch -> th ) $.
wl-syl6 $p |- ( ph -> ( ps -> th ) ) $.
